patterns: can I add a nominee in my locker
what is the procedure to add a nominee in my locker?
what is the procedure to cancel a nominee in my locker?
what is the procedure to modify a nominee in my locker?
responses: You will need to fill up the following forms and submit it to your locker branch. The forms are available in the Forms centre section of our website. - For addition of a nominee: Form SL1 (sole hirer) / SL1A (joint hirer) - For cancellation of nomination: Form SL2 - For change of nomination: Form SL3 (sole hirer) / SL3A (joint hirer)

patterns: how can I stop a cheque payment?
how can I cancel a cheque payment?
what is the procedure to stop a cheque payment
what is the procedure to cancel a cheque payment
what are steps to stop a cheque payment
what are steps to cancel a cheque payment
responses: To make a Stop Payment request on an issued Cheque, kindly follow the steps mentioned below: 1. Log in to your NetBanking account 2. Click on the Stop Payment of Cheque option available under Request menu on the left hand side of the web page Select the Account Number (if more than 1 account) Enter first/Start cheque number to the last/End cheque number, with a reason for stopping the payment. Click on Continue. On the next web page, you can verify and click on Confirm tab to confirm the stop payment request.

patterns: can a salary account have a joint applicant?
how to open joint salary account
responses: Yes, parents, spouse, child or sibling can be a joint applicant to an account. The joint applicant will need to submit a valid photo ID and address proof.

patterns: how do i block my credit  card
steps to block credit card
where do i block credit card
responses: When a card is lost or stolen or damaged, the same should be blocked immediately and reissued.  Request to block & reissue of card can be made through following channels:-Website sbicard.com

patterns: how do i report lost credit card
steps to report lost credit card
where do i report lost credit card
how do i report stolen credit card
steps to report stolen credit card
where do i report stolen credit card
reissue stolen credit card
reissue lost credit card
responses: To report lost/stolen credit card and reissue through website, follow these simple steps: Step 1 Log in to your account on sbicard.com Step 2 Click on ‘Report Lost/Stolen Card’ under the ‘Requests’ tab on the left
